Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.1 Paṭiccavāra » 21.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 21.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Najhāna
Ajjhattattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Najhāna
13.
2783Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—  pañcaviññāṇasahagataṃ…pe…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ…pe… . (1)
2784Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—  pañcaviññāṇasahagataṃ…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ…pe… . (1)
